name: Block Fuse
description:
Block Fuse is an indie game with a theme different from anything seen before.

You will face a few levels where you are presented with constructions of different shapes and sizes formed by building blocks with different shapes and sizes.
What you have to do is take charge of demolishing those buildings, to demolish them, you will have ammunition, specifically balls that you can shoot at buildings to throw them away.
It may seem simple, but the buildings and the game in general follow the laws of real-world physics, so you'll have to try different shots at different strategic points to affect the overall structure and tear it down

Apart from that, to add difficulty to the game, the amount of bowls you can shoot, that is, the ammunition, is limited, with a fixed amount in each level.
Apart from that, you will be required a number of blocks to throw in each level, and if you do not reach that amount having spent all the ammunition you will lose and you will have to repeat the level.

It may seem easy, but it is a difficult game, we challenge you to pass all the levels, but we are sure that you will not pass any level at the first attemp.
